release_state_notes: v2.12.2 governance reconciliation is sealed with deterministic integrity fingerprints.
author: David Bordne (@BordneAI)
description: Science-grounded, consciousness-aware gateway system for 3i/ATLAS (C/2025 N1) with provenance discipline, adaptive clarification, rumor radar, and enforced ephemeris sourcing. Updated to BordneAI v2.12.2 governance reconciliation patch with no new protocols or behavior surfaces; this release hardens cross-surface version integrity, metadata consistency, and audit/signature policy routing.

instructions.txt.purpose: System prompt with operational guidelines, tool/browse rules, and governance routing

CHANGELOG.md.purpose: Release history and change summaries (canonical release surface)

README.md.purpose: Deployment guide and governance overview (non-canonical; explanatory)

knowledge_base_merged_v2.json.purpose: Primary knowledge base with verified facts, interpretations, practices, and entropy signal map

conversation_starters.json.purpose: Persona-aware prompts including Settings (98), Tools (97), auditor triggers

sources.json.purpose: Tiered source registry with provenance metadata

kb_updates_cumulative.json.purpose: Pending knowledge base updates awaiting review and integration

kb_changelog.json.purpose: Immutable log of applied knowledge base updates with audit trail

tags_index.json.purpose: Searchable tag index for knowledge base navigation

stress_test_framework.json.purpose: STF-ATLAS validation scenarios and auditor overlay hooks

docs/aaiv_protocol_v2.12.md.purpose: AAIV protocol scaffolding (T4-only, opt-in, natural-first, low priors)

docs/aaiv_agent_spec_v2.12.md.purpose: AAIV Assessment Agent design spec (natural pass â†’ AAIV what-if â†’ discriminants â†’ Bayesian-style conclusion)

version_alignment_notes.instructions.txt: Version is declared in the document header (v2.12.2).
version_alignment_notes.tags_index.json: Top-level version is authoritative for manifest alignment; counts are normalized so total_tags and integrity_validation.tag_count match.
version_alignment_notes.sources.json: Top-level version is 2.12.0; sources_version may mark lineage and is not the release surface.
version_alignment_notes.docs/aaiv_protocol_v2.12.md: Version is declared in the markdown title/header.
version_alignment_notes.docs/aaiv_agent_spec_v2.12.md: Version is declared in the markdown title/header.

changelog_summary.v2.8: Entropy Domain Control; Settings (98); Tools (97); adaptive fetch; token budgeting; Canvas Insight Blocks; Confidence Bar; Mini-Timeline; Auditor profile; watermark/IP controls
changelog_summary.v2.7.3: Adaptive clarification protocol integration, comprehensive stress test results
changelog_summary.v2.7.2: Adaptive clarification protocol to handle implicit ambiguity
changelog_summary.v2.7.1: Updated claims with non-grav acceleration data (where applicable)
changelog_summary.v2.4: Sample responses restoration; menu item 15 added
changelog_summary.v2.11.2: Ergonomics and governance updates: plain/simple mode toggle, audit footer option, ephemeris helper pattern, rumor handling, external evaluations organization.
changelog_summary.v2.12.0: AAIV scaffolding: added AAIV protocol + agent spec (T4-only, opt-in, natural-first, low priors); no default runtime behavior changes.
changelog_summary.v2.12.2: Truth Surface Reconciliation Patch: synchronized release surfaces, aligned manifest file-version metadata, normalized tags index schema metadata, added explicit re-audit/re-sign checklist policy, and clarified enforceable 30-day currency/archival routing rules.

key_features.provenance_discipline: Source registry + as_of + confidence labeling for factual claims
key_features.adaptive_clarification: Triggers on ambiguity; fast-path for explicit requests
key_features.tiered_sourcing: T1 (Agency) â†’ T2 (Preprint/Docs) â†’ T3 (Press) â†’ T4 (Community)
key_features.epistemic_humility: Uncertainty labeling (âœ… Verified, ðŸ” Interpretation, ðŸŒ€ Practice, âš ï¸ Caution)
key_features.living_knowledge_base: Updates via kb_updates_cumulative.json with review workflow
key_features.entropy_domain_control: Multi-level domain/entropy scoring to reduce drift and guide browsing depth
key_features.auditor_profile: Strict Mode, rumor control, token hard-cap, self-audit footer

integrity_checks.json_validation: All JSON must be UTF-8 with straight quotes; no trailing commas
integrity_checks.source_verification: All source_ids in KB must exist in sources.json
integrity_checks.confidence_integrity: All facts must include confidence levels
integrity_checks.date_currency: as_of dates within 30 days for T1/T2 sources where applicable
integrity_checks.date_currency_applicability: Applicable when a T1/T2-backed claim is time-sensitive or operational (ephemeris, visibility windows, schedules, active campaign status, safety/risk status tied to dates). Non-time-sensitive historical or fixed-reference records are exempt.

date_currency_enforcement.refresh_sweep: Update stale as_of values from current qualifying T1/T2 sources before release.
date_currency_enforcement.archival_demotion: If refresh is not performed, mark the content archival, keep absolute dates visible, and prevent presentation as current operational guidance.

integrity_checks.assistant_archival_routing_rule: When serving archival content, label it as archival and present absolute dates (YYYY-MM-DD) in output.
integrity_checks.watermark_policy: All responses append Â© BordneAI watermark and version fingerprint
